strapiPost.title: 2022 Freedom Festival Celebrating Juneteenth To Take Place At Shiloh Square
strapiPost.content:
Juneteenth is approaching, and there are a few big ways to celebrate coming up in Northwest Arkansas.

  • Connections: Juneteenth is now a federal holiday commemorating the day all Americans became free. As a part of the communityâ€™s celebrations this weekend and to bring awareness, education, and exposure, the Second Annual Arkansas Black Film Showcase will be at Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art today at 6p. 
  • For all to celebrate: On Sunday, June 19, is the 2022 Freedom Festival, a free Juneteenth celebration that will be held at Shiloh Square in downtown Springdale from 1-9p. The event will feature music by loved artists, free food, games, exhibits, giveaways, a wellness fair, and more.
